title: Mean Value Theorem
text: The Mean Value Theorem states that if a function f is continuous on the closed interval [a,b] and differentiable on the open interval (a,b), then there exists a point c in the interval (a,b) such that f'(c) is equal to the function's average rate of change over [a,b]. First, solve for the slope of the tangent line using the MVT

title: Solve for c
text: Now equal the slope to the derivative to find c
